questions.title: Details of Total Energy Consumption
questions.description: Details of total energy consumption (in Joules or multiples) and energy intensity, including total electricity consumption, fuel consumption, energy from other sources, energy intensity per rupee of turnover, and optional energy intensity metrics. Indicate if independent assessment/evaluation/assurance has been carried out by an external agency (Y/N) and name of the agency.

rows.parameter:
Energy intensity per rupee of turnover
(Total energy consumption/ turnover in rupees)
Energy intensity (optional) – the relevant metric may be selected by the entity

metadata.note: Indicate if any independent assessment/ evaluation/assurance has been carried out by an external agency? (Y/N) If yes, name of the external agency.

questions.title: Energy Consumption from Renewable and Non-Renewable Sources
questions.description: Break-up of total energy consumed (in Joules or multiples) from renewable and non-renewable sources, including electricity, fuel, and other sources for both categories. Indicate if independent assessment/evaluation/assurance has been carried out by an external agency (Y/N) and name of the agency.

metadata.note: Indicate if any independent assessment/ evaluation/assurance has been carried out by an external agency? (Y/N) If yes, name of the external agency.

questions.title: PAT Scheme Participation
questions.description: Does the entity have sites/facilities identified as designated consumers (DCs) under the Performance, Achieve and Trade (PAT) Scheme? (Y/N) If yes, disclose whether targets set under the PAT scheme have been achieved, and if not, provide remedial actions taken.

questions.title: Water Withdrawal and Consumption
questions.description: Details of water withdrawal by source (surface water, groundwater, third-party water, seawater/desalinated water, others), total volume of water withdrawal and consumption (in kilolitres), water intensity per rupee of turnover, and optional water intensity metrics. Indicate if independent assessment/evaluation/assurance has been carried out by an external agency (Y/N) and name of the agency.

rows.parameter: Total volume of water withdrawal (in kilolitres) (i + ii + iii + iv + v)

Water intensity per rupee of turnover
(Water consumed / turnover)
Water intensity (optional) – the relevant metric may be selected by the entity

metadata.note: Indicate if any independent assessment/ evaluation/assurance has been carried out by an external agency? (Y/N) If yes, name of the external agency.

questions.title: Water in Areas of Water Stress
questions.description: For facilities in areas of water stress, provide details of the area, nature of operations, water withdrawal by source, total volume of water withdrawal and consumption (in kilolitres), water intensity per rupee of turnover, optional water intensity metrics, and water discharge by destination and treatment level. Indicate if independent assessment/evaluation/assurance has been carried out by an external agency (Y/N) and name of the agency.

rows.parameter: Total volume of water withdrawal (in kilolitres) (i + ii + iii + iv + v)

Water intensity per rupee of turnover
(Water consumed / turnover)
Water intensity (optional) – the relevant metric may be selected by the entity

metadata.note: Indicate if any independent assessment/ evaluation/assurance has been carried out by an external agency? (Y/N) If yes, name of the external agency.

questions.title: Zero Liquid Discharge Mechanism
questions.description: Has the entity implemented a mechanism for Zero Liquid Discharge? If yes, provide details of its coverage and implementation.

questions.title: Water Discharge Details
questions.description: Details of water discharge by destination (surface water, groundwater, seawater, third parties, others) and level of treatment (no treatment or specify treatment level), including total water discharged (in kilolitres). Indicate if independent assessment/evaluation/assurance has been carried out by an external agency (Y/N) and name of the agency.

rows.parameter: Water discharge by destination and level of treatment (in kilolitres)
- With treatment – please specify level of treatment
- With treatment – please specify level of treatment

- With treatment – please specify level of treatment
- With treatment – please specify level of treatment

metadata.note: Indicate if any independent assessment/ evaluation/assurance has been carried out by an external agency? (Y/N) If yes, name of the external agency.

questions.title: Air Emissions (Non-GHG)
questions.description: Details of air emissions (other than GHG emissions), including NOx, SOx, particulate matter (PM), persistent organic pollutants (POP), volatile organic compounds (VOC), hazardous air pollutants (HAP), and others (specify unit). Indicate if independent assessment/evaluation/assurance has been carried out by an external agency (Y/N) and name of the agency.

metadata.note: Indicate if any independent assessment/ evaluation/assurance has been carried out by an external agency? (Y/N) If yes, name of the external agency.

questions.title: Scope 1 and Scope 2 Emissions
questions.description: Details of greenhouse gas emissions (Scope 1 and Scope 2) and intensity, including break-up of GHG (CO2, CH4, N2O, HFCs, PFCs, SF6, NF3) in metric tonnes of CO2 equivalent, total Scope 1 and Scope 2 emissions per rupee of turnover, and optional emission intensity metrics. Indicate if independent assessment/evaluation/assurance has been carried out by an external agency (Y/N) and name of the agency.

rows.parameter:
Total Scope 1 emissions
(Break-up of the GHG into CO2, CH4, N2O, HFCs, PFCs, SF6, NF3, if available)

Total Scope 2 emissions
(Break-up of the GHG into CO2, CH4, N2O, HFCs, PFCs, SF6, NF3, if available)
Total Scope 1 and Scope 2 emissions per rupee of turnover
Total Scope 1 and Scope 2 emission intensity (optional) – the relevant metric may be selected by the entity

metadata.note: Indicate if any independent assessment/ evaluation/assurance has been carried out by an external agency? (Y/N) If yes, name of the external agency.

questions.title: Scope 3 Emissions
questions.description: Details of total Scope 3 emissions, including break-up of GHG (CO2, CH4, N2O, HFCs, PFCs, SF6, NF3) in metric tonnes of CO2 equivalent, total Scope 3 emissions per rupee of turnover, and optional emission intensity metrics. Indicate if independent assessment/evaluation/assurance has been carried out by an external agency (Y/N) and name of the agency.

rows.parameter:
Total Scope 3 emissions
(Break-up of the GHG into CO2, CH4, N2O, HFCs, PFCs, SF6, NF3, if available)
Total Scope 3 emissions per rupee of turnover
Total Scope 3 emission intensity (optional) – the relevant metric may be selected by the entity

metadata.note: Indicate if any independent assessment/ evaluation/assurance has been carried out by an external agency? (Y/N) If yes, name of the external agency.

questions.title: GHG Emission Reduction Projects
questions.description: Does the entity have any project related to reducing greenhouse gas emissions? If yes, provide details.

questions.title: Resource Efficiency and Emission Reduction Initiatives
questions.description: Details of specific initiatives or innovative technologies to improve resource efficiency or reduce emissions/effluent discharge/waste, including initiative details (with web links, if any) and outcomes.

columns.label: Details of the initiative (Web-link, if any, may be provided along-with summary)

questions.title: Waste Management Details
questions.description: Details of total waste generated (in metric tonnes), including plastic, e-waste, bio-medical, construction and demolition, battery, radioactive, hazardous, and non-hazardous waste. For each category, provide waste recovered (recycled, re-used, other recovery operations) and waste disposed (incineration, landfilling, other disposal methods). Indicate if independent assessment/evaluation/assurance has been carried out by an external agency (Y/N) and name of the agency.

rows.parameter: Other Hazardous waste. Please specify, if any. (G)
Other Non-hazardous waste generated (H). Please specify, if any. (Break-up by composition i.e. by materials relevant to the sector)

tables.title: For each category of waste generated, total waste recovered through recycling, re-using or other recovery operations (in metric tonnes)
For each category of waste generated, total waste disposed by nature of disposal method (in metric tonnes)

metadata.note: Indicate if any independent assessment/ evaluation/assurance has been carried out by an external agency? (Y/N) If yes, name of the external agency.

questions.title: Waste Management Practices
questions.description: Description of waste management practices, including strategies to reduce hazardous and toxic chemical usage in products/processes and practices to manage such wastes.

questions.title: Operations in Ecologically Sensitive Areas
questions.description: Details of operations/offices in/around ecologically sensitive areas (national parks, wildlife sanctuaries, biosphere reserves, wetlands, biodiversity hotspots, forests, coastal regulation zones, etc.), including location, type of operations, compliance with environmental approvals/clearances (Y/N), and reasons/corrective actions for non-compliance.

columns.label:
Whether the conditions of environmental approval / clearance are being complied with? (Y/N)
If no, the reasons thereof and corrective action taken, if any.

questions.title: Biodiversity Impact in Ecologically Sensitive Areas
questions.description: Details of significant direct and indirect impacts on biodiversity in ecologically sensitive areas reported in Essential Indicator 10, along with prevention and remediation activities.

questions.title: Environmental Impact Assessments
questions.description: Details of environmental impact assessments for projects in the current financial year, including project details, EIA notification number, date, whether conducted by an independent external agency, results communicated in the public domain, and relevant web links.

columns.label: Name and brief details of project

Whether conducted by independent external agency
(Yes / No)

Results communicated in public domain
(Yes / No)

questions.title: Compliance with Environmental Laws
questions.description: Is the entity compliant with applicable environmental laws/regulations/guidelines in India (e.g., Water Act, Air Act, Environment Protection Act)? (Y/N) If not, specify the law/regulation, details of non-compliance, fines/penalties/actions by regulatory agencies or courts, and corrective actions taken.

columns.label: Specify the law / regulation / guidelines which was not complied with
Any fines / penalties / action taken by regulatory agencies such as pollution control boards or by courts

questions.title: Environmental Impact of Value Chain
questions.description: Disclose any significant adverse environmental impact arising from the entity's value chain and mitigation or adaptation measures taken.

questions.title: Assessment of Value Chain Partners
questions.description: Percentage of value chain partners (by value of business done) assessed for environmental impacts.

questions.title: Business Continuity and Disaster Management Plan
questions.description: Does the entity have a business continuity and disaster management plan? Provide details in 100 words or a web link.
